1.3.4.name: wordpress/multi-twitter-stream-by-wsyms
1.3.4.description:
This wordpress Twitter plugin support multiple twitter accounts and displays the tweets of the users in chronological order.

If you want to be in the featured blog or website examples that uses this plugin, just send me a link to your blog at contact@williamsyms.com

NEW IMPORTANT INFORMATION

The official developement repository is now on github here. You are welcome to help contributing to this plugin.

Any bug or support request have to be reported here! Or else they won't be answered. Thanks.
